entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test fails with connection resolved from provider of AddDbContext but succeeds with one resolved from services of ConfigureTestServices() #33965
  • Cosmos: Allow database management operations using RBAC #33964
  • Make Cosmos function mapping dependencies public #33963
  • EF 7 is generating SQL with incorrect syntax near the keyword OPTION #33962
  • Make GUID keys auto-generated in Cosmos even if a partition key is used #33961
  • Cosmos: Extra clauses are removed from the query when extracting hierarchical partition key values #33960
    9.0.0
  • Better reporting for compiled_query_cache_hit_rate metric #33959
  • Additional optimization suggestions for CASE #33957
    Backlog

Closed

  • `builder.Entity<>().Property().Metadata.SetAfterSaveBehavior()` cannot be used with `.HasOne()` on the same prop #33945
  • Cosmos: implement EF.Functions.CoalesceUndefined #33904
    9.0.0
  • Cosmos: Add support for IS_DEFINED() to EF.Functions #17722
    9.0.0
  • JSON columns throws Invalid token type: 'StartObject' exception with AsNoTrackingWithIdentityResolution() #33073
    9.0.0
  • EnsureCreated() returning incorrect return value for SQLite #33930
    8.0.0
  • Table-specific facet configuration with TPT results in wrong column names with SQLite #33955
  • EF Core 8.0: Arrays with Microsoft SQL Server: Any type for which you define your own value converter #33958
  • Table alias regression on ExecuteUpdate on SQL Server #33937
    9.0.0
  • Cosmos: Translate string.Contains, StartsWith, EndsWith with ComparisonType #25250
    9.0.0
  • Query: optimize NOT (CASE WHEN x THEN 1 ELSE 0) by pushing NOT into the THEN/ELSE #33857
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Use TokenCredential for Cosmos tests #33966
    tell-mode

Merged

  • Use TokenCredential for Cosmos tests #33956
  • Cosmos: work on Skip/Take, undefined #33935
  • Fix to #33073 - JSON columns throws Invalid token type: 'StartObject' exception with AsNoTrackingWithIdentityResolution() #33101
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #33944
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Fix UpdateExpression.VisitChildren to visit the setter column #33948
  • Remove optimization of `NOT(a != b)` #33943
  • Simplify NOT (CASE ... THEN const) by pushing NOT into the THEN/ELSE #33934
  • Cosmos: Translate string.Contains/StartsWith/EndsWith with OrdinalIgnoreCase #33936

Updated

  • Support ReadItem for no-tracking queries #33927
  • TrimStart and TrimEnd with optional char array implementation for SQL Server #33715
  • Simplify `COALESCE` based on the nullability of its arguments #33938
